duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform all aspects of technical operations including software installation, upgrades, patching, and system responsiveness.
Resolve complex technical problems using deep knowledge and experience.
Provide support for tier 2 application issues and oversee infrastructure operations and maintenance.
Participate in project plans and schedules, and report and track open issues and action items.
Maintain AWS spreadsheet capturing storage and instance information, and support DevSecOps Transition initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or relevant field (Master's preferred)
